name: @nodejs/node-url-to-whatwg-url
description: Handle DEP0116 via transforming `url.parse` to `new URL()`

scripts.test: node --run test:import-process && node --run test:url-format && node --run test:url-parse
scripts.test:import-process: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/import-process.ts ./tests/ --filter import-process
scripts.test:url-format: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/url-format.ts ./tests/ --filter url-format
scripts.test:url-parse: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/url-parse.ts ./tests/ --filter url-parse

author: Augustin Mauroy
